description.zh: 大學入門是針對大一新生所開授之全校性課程。用以協助學生：(一) 認識高等教育的理念、目的與價值 (二) 有效學習 (三) 涵養正視困境並妥適因應能力。藉以實踐自我鍛鍊，自我掌握，自我經營並建構宏觀視界的高等教育宗旨。
description.en: "First step to achieving the goals of universities" is a campus-wide course provided for all of the first-year students at this school. The course is designed to help first-year students to achieve the following aims and objectives:(1) understanding the basic idea, goals, and fundamental value of higher education at college level;(2) learning proper study attitudes and methods effectively;(3) cultivating the required abilities and skills of responding appropriately to setbacks and difficult situations in order to acquire self-knowledge, self-control, and self-management, so that they may construct the knowledge and imagination that are needed in planning for grand visions of achieving the goals of higher education.

name.en: First step to achieving the goals of universities

description.zh: 各學院指定向度學分規定如下：機電學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。電資學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、自然與科學向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。工程學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。管理學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、自然與科學向度課程 4 學分。設計學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。
description.en: The dimension credits stipulated by each college are as follows：CMEE：4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the Social and Rules of Law curriculum, and 4 credits for the innovation and entrepreneurship curriculum.EECS：4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the nature and science curriculum, and 4 credits for the innovation and entrepreneurship curriculum.College of Engineering：4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the Social and Rules of Law curriculum, and 4 credits for the innovation and entrepreneurship curriculum.College of Management：4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the Social and Rules of Law curriculum, and 4 credits for the nature and science curriculum.College of Design： 4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the Social and Rules of Law curriculum, and 4 credits for the innovation and entrepreneurship curriculum.CHASS：4 credits for t

name.zh: 學院指定向度 - 人文與藝術
name.en: College designated dimension curriculum：Humanities and Art

description.zh: 各學院指定向度學分規定如下：機電學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。工程學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。管理學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、自然與科學向度課程 4 學分。設計學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。人社學院：社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、自然與科學向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。修完學院指定向度課程 12 學分，剩餘 6 學分可在人文與藝術向度、社會與法治向度、自然與科學向度及創新與創業向度自由修滿，達到通識畢業 18 學分。
description.en: The dimension credits stipulated by each college are as follows：College of Mechanical and Electrical Engineering：4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the Social and Rules of Law curriculum, and 4 credits for the innovation and entrepreneurship curriculum.College of Engineering： 4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the Social and Rules of Law curriculum, and 4 credits for the innovation and entrepreneurship curriculum.College of Management： 4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the Social and Rules of Law curriculum, and 4 credits for the nature and science curriculum.College of Design： 4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the Social and Rules of Law curriculum, and 4 credits for the innovation and entrepreneurship curriculum.

name.zh: 學院指定向度 - 社會與法治
name.en: College designated dimension curriculum：Social and Rules of Law

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1. 極限與連續，2. 導數及其應用，3. 不定積分與定積分，4. 超越函數及其反函數，5. 積分法則，6. 不定型與瑕積分，7. 定積分的應用，8. 空間幾何與向量微積分，9. 偏導數，10. 重積分。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹計算機系統之基礎觀念以及應用。主要內容包括：1. 計算機系統簡介 2 . 資料的表示法、數字系統、邏輯 3. 周邊裝置及儲存體 4. 程式語言與程式設計 5. 軟體工程與系統開發工具 6. 資料結構與演算法 7. 作業系統 8. 檔案與資料庫 9. 資料通訊與計算機網路 10. 人工智慧 11. 新興技術介紹
description.en: This introductory course covers the fundamentals and applications of computers. The major topics covered in this course are: 1.Introduction to computer systems 2.Data representation, number systems, and logic 3.Peripherals and storage 4. Programming languages and programming 5. Data structures and algorithms 6. Software engineering and system development tools 7. Operating systems 8.File and database systems 9. Data communication and computer networks 10. Artificial intelligence 11. Emerging techniques

description.zh: 介紹程式語言基本資料處理的概念， 包含基本輸入與輸出、程式的流程控制、函數的應用等指令之撰寫、程式之編輯、編譯、聯絡與程式之執行，並發展一套應用程式。
description.en: This course introduces the basic data processes of C++ language. They include input/output, program process control, application of functions, program editing and execution, and so on.

description.zh: 本課程主要使學生能強化會計學的基本觀念，並以國際會計原則 (IFRS) 為架構，熟悉會計流程與財務報表之編製。課程內容包含會計恆等式與財務報表的介紹、借貸法則、會計處理程序 (分錄、過帳、試算) 與調整、結帳與會計循環的完成、買賣業會計、存貨的會計處理、現金、應收帳款、不動產、廠房與設備、無形資產、負債、股東權益、以及投資活動的會計處理，最後則是現金流量表的編制，與財務報表的運用與分析。
description.en: This course is an introduction to the basic concepts and standards underlying financial accounting systems. Several important concepts will be studied in detail, including: cash, accounts and notes receivable, inventory, marketable securities, equity investments, PPE, intangibles, debt, equity issuance, and dividends. The course emphasizes the construction of the basic financial accounting statements - the income statement, retained earnings statement, statement of financial position, and statement of cash flows - as well as their interpretation. Financial accounting focuses on providing information that is relevant and useful for external users. This course expands your knowledge of understanding of the basic language and conceptions of accounting. The basic accounting concepts that will help you solve problems and exercises designed to transaction recording and financial statement preparation.

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程是設計給研究所的理、工科學生作為研習管理的入門課程 (實務研討)，內容大體上包括有管理的基本理論、管理資訊系統、創新性技術對傳統的挑戰、科技法律概念、科技發展的專利地圖與迴避設計、科技知識管理、個案討論等等。在今天快速變動與競爭激烈的經營環境中，屬於無形資產之一的科學技術往往被認為是企業最不容易評估以及最不容易管理的課題，從歷史眼光看，大凡一家公司能夠將本身的技術管理的好並且能即時掌握競爭對手的最新技術動態，通常多能成就一番非凡事業。
description.en: The course is designed as a preliminary management study for graduate school  students majoring in science and engineering. It is focused on issues related to: Fundamental Principles of Management, Management Information System, The Challenge of Innovative Technologies to Tradition, The Concept of Technology Law, Patent Mapping and Design -Around of Research & Development, Knowledge management of Technology and Case Discussions, etc. In today's fast moving and keenly competitive management environment, the evaluation and management of the scientific technology, one of the intangible assets, have been considered the ultimately difficult issues in every business enterprise. From the viewpoint of history, provided that an enterprise not only can properly manage their own technology but also can get the latest information of their competitors' technologies, it would always accomplish notable achievements.

description.zh: 1. 陶瓷絕緣體之性質 2. 陶瓷電容材料 3. 壓電及光電陶瓷 4. 磁性陶瓷 5. 陶瓷感應器：理論及實務 6. ZnO 變阻器之應用及特性 7. 多層陶瓷技術 8. 高電導陶瓷
description.en: This course is a special topics of Dielectrical Materials.

description.zh: 本課程主要是開設給已經修過 "粉末冶金學" 的學生，對粉末冶金製程與粉末冶金技術的應用有更進一步的認識。課程的安排在製程方面，強調粉末特性對粉末冶金製程的影響，成形模具的設計，燒結理論與現象，燒結体的後處理等。應用方面以本國現有的粉末冶金工廠與其製品為主，例如：機械零件、超硬工具材料、磁性材料、電接點材料、摩擦材料等製程的講述。
description.en: This course is a special topics of  Topic of powder metallurgy.

description.zh: 1. 電力電子元件的規格 2. 電力電子元件特性 3. 元件與電路佈局 4. 元件特性與雜訊 5. 元件特性與損失 6. 元件的選用與電路系統
description.en: 1. Device Specification 2.Device Characteristics 3. Component And Layout 4. Circuit Noise 5. Device Loss 6. Device Selection and Circuit Implementation.

description.zh: 1 設計的基本概念 2 架構、資料型別與運算子 3 組合與循序邏輯 4 函式 / 程序與屬性 / 組態 5 階層式設計 6 功能與時序模擬 7 設計合成 8 狀態機設計 9 管線式處理 10. 記憶體設計 11. 特殊應用積體電路設計與實作
description.en: This course both provides the digital logical concepts and trains the student how to use the computer-aided design tools to simulate and to implement the advanced FPGA system. The contents of this course are listed as following: 1.Design concepts to logic circuits 2.Structure, data type and operator 3.Combinationa-circuit and Sequential-circuit 4.Function/process and task/attribute 5.Architectural design 6.Functional and timing simulation 7.Synthesizer 8.State machine design 9.Pipelined process 10.RAM and ROM 11.ASIC design and implementation.

name.zh: 高等 FPGA 系統設計

description.zh: 研究生須要具有整合、分析資料與創新思維、寫作能力以完成碩博士論文。本課程主要包括：一、 良好研究特質，二、 研究規劃， 三、學習方法， 四、 創新思維方法 五、 寫作方法， 六、 簡報方法， 七、 研究實務練習
description.en: Graduate students need to integrate information and innovative insights to successfully achieve a master or Ph.D degree. The course includes:1. Characteristics of good researchers. 2. Research planning. 3. Learning method. 4. Innovative thinking.5. Writing method. 6. Present method.7. Research design practice

description.zh: 就基本光學及人體工學之視覺基本理論及測試方法，以確立照明之質與量的標準，先就現有燈泡、燈管、燈具作整體性之介紹並就其特性比較，從而建立選擇之標準，不僅要求光的亮度，並且綜合考慮光的品質，燈具的安全性，經濟效益、能源的節約及燈具設計，針對亮度的計算，介紹三種不同的計算方法，以供設計使用，綜合前述之重點，就商業、工業、戶外及特性照明等設計，逐一以實例說明，並兼述燈具之控制線路及有關法令。
description.en: Course Title:Design of LightingDescription:This course is designed for one-semester program in thelighting. The main purpose of this course is to introduce thesoftwares and hardwares of lighting. (including lighting equipements.lighting design, transmission system. and distribution system) and howto maintain these equipments.

description.zh: 1. 空間描述與數學轉換 2. 機械手臂運動學 3. 機械手臂反向運動學 4. 賈氏矩陣 5. 軌跡規劃 6. 機械手臂之線性控制 7. 機器人視覺 8. 機器人避障 9. 工業自動化應用 10. 實驗項目：機械手臂及機器人操控、結合視覺感測之機械手臂自動化系統、機器人導航與控制
description.en: 1.Spatial description transformation 2.Manipulation kinematics 3.Inverse manipulation kinematics 4.Jacobians 5.Trajectory generation6.Linear control of manipulator 7.Machine vision 8.Robotic obstacle avoidance 9.Industrial automation applications 10.Laboratory work: control of manipulators and mobile robots, automatic manipulation with vision sensors, navigation and control of mobile robots

description.zh: 本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。包含有限元素分析法之基本觀念，利用變分原理建立有限元素模式，形狀函數及等參數元素，一維問題：桿、桁架、樑及骨架等，二維問題：平面應力應變及板殼問題。三維問題：一般實體，有限元素分析之計算機程式處理，有限元素分析於動態問題之應用，相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
description.en: Introduction to the finite element method and its application to engineering problems.  Topics include Variational Formulation and Finite Element Formulations, 1-D, 2-D and 3-D Element Shapes, Numerical Integration, Applications to dynamic problem and Introduction to Commercial Finite Element Programs.

notes: 英語授課，日職車輛所、能源所、機電博合開

description.zh: 以都會區空氣品質為範圍，配合污染源類別﹙粒狀物，SOx， NOx， VOC， THC 及 O3﹚，本課程從逸散性、固定污染性、移動污染性等不同方向，以講述空品之規劃與管理等問題。此包括 PSI 指標與空品特性分析，及減目標與管制策略之研訂等。
description.en: The course gives a brief introduction to planning and management for air quality. The main contents are focused on fugitive pollution, stationary, and movable sources. Index of pollution standard will be also discussed in the course.

name.en: Planning and Management for Air Quality

description.zh: 本課程著重於環境污染物之微量監測與分析內容，此包括有機有毒物、重金屬之儀器分析原理、化學理論及分析方法。修習本課程宜有化學基礎。
description.en: The course introduces monitoring and analysis for environment pollutants. It focuses the micro quantity analysis based on chemical theory. Modern instruments with high sensitivity will be also discussed.

name.en: Monitoring and Analysis for Environmental Pollutants

description.zh: 課程介紹雲端資訊計算與運用相關技術，使學生對雲端平台、架構、服務有全面性瞭解。課程內容包括： 1. 雲端運算發展近況及基本概念 2. 資源虛擬化之基本概念與技術，3. 雲端運算相關技術、效能與安全，4. 虛擬化資料中心建置 - 虛擬計算、儲存、網路與應用，6. 雲端服務規劃，7. 雲端之基礎設施服務、平台服務、軟體服務介紹，8. 專題討論。
description.en: Cloud Computing, either private, public or hybrid, is dramatically transforming every aspect of IT. Now it has become ubiquitous these days, and is the key foundation for developing technologies of Big Data and Internet of Things (IoT). Its deployment starts delivering applications with more benefits than the existing legacy infrastructure.Because the terms are broadly quoted and adopted, then by this course, the Cloud Computing core technologies and the associated below will be well introduced:1.Cloud Computing Basic Concept 2.Resources Virtualization & Software Defined Data Center (SDDC)3.Cloud Computing Security 4.Cloud Technologies5.Cloud Service Planning and Deployment 6.Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS)7.Platform as a Service (PaaS)8.Software as a Services (SaaS)9.Cloud Service Operations 10.Case Studies and presentation

name.en: Principles and Practices of  Cloud Computing

description.zh: 如何藉由商務模型的分析，建置數位化協同產品設計與開發環境，並說明資料管理、構型管隨著網路時代的來臨，不但造成數位化協同產品設計與開發觀念的興起，也造成數位化協同平台技術逐漸成熟，並且將同步工程觀念的實現更往前邁進一大步。本課程是從數位化協同產品設計與開發概念之介紹開始，使學生明白數位化協同產品設計與開發在現代製造業中的重要性，接著介紹理與工作流程管理等相關實務應用觀念。
description.en: Information and network technologies have promoted the traditional concurrent engineering to the next generation. The collaborative e-design and e-development concept has been more popular in industries. This course is introduced from the concept of collaborative product design and development to help students understanding the importance of collaborative e-design and e-development in modern industries. Furthermore, the business model analysis method is provided to construct the collaborative environment of e-design and e-development. In addition, some real cases of data management, configuration management, and workflow management are mentioned.

name.zh: 數位化設計與開發特論
name.en: Special Topics on e-Design and e-Development

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意表面現象，介面反應等與近代高科技技術，如鍍膜工程，表面處理，腐蝕，磨潤，微機電，感測器，半導體技術等息息相關，且日益重要。表面分析是原子層次的相關研究，它包括振動，電子或離子頻譜分析，微技術等之應用。主要的項目包含，表面形貌觀察 (SEM, BSEM, AFM), 成份分析 ( 光譜分析，質譜分析，EDX ), 結構分析 ( XRD, AES, ESCA, XPS ), 鍵結分析 ( Raman 光譜，FTIR ), 表面粗糙度，膜厚，附著力，內應力等膜之特性分析。
description.en: Surface phenomena and processes occurring at interface are becoming increasingly important in a wide variety of industrial applications including the areas of films coating surface treatments, conclusion, triobology, microelectronics, sensors and semi-conductor technologies.  Accompanying this is an ever-growing need for surface characterization allowing better definition of processes occurring at a microscopic level.Surface analysis is the use of vibration, electron or ion spectroscopic and microscopic techniques for the study of material at the atomic level, it includesSEM, AFM, XRD, EDX, ESCA, XPS, AES, Raman Spectrum, and FTIR analysis.

description.zh: 21 世紀的工業設計師已不能再靜待市場研究及產品企劃人員提供產品設計規範，而應以使用者代言人、及企業產品開發整合者身分，主動參與產品策略與企劃，並以視覺化技術協助相關人員作橫向溝通。因此，「產品創新設計策略與企劃」課程主要目標在教導學生以「前瞻性的視野」，透過創新設計的步驟與方法，策劃出符合企業技術及經營體質，並且能滿足市場及使用者使用情況需求的產品。本課程將以理論、方法、案例研討及個案研究方式進行。
description.en: The function of industrial design in the 21st  century, will no longer waiting for the product definition from the marketing and product planning, It will become a integrator and visualizer during the product innovation strategic phase, and concerning to the user's needs.          	Product Innovation Strategy will guide the enterprise looking beyond their current operation to match their technologies and the distinct competencies with emerging the user and the market needs.The contents of this topic will include theory, methodology, and practical case study.

notes: 工設三四上限 10 / 日碩博上限 20 / 職碩上限 12；一教 1F

description.zh: 藉由國內外設計競賽主題與產學合作設計案進行實際演練，著重於資料蒐集、商品分析、創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成，期讓學生在國內外設計競賽舞台上展現光芒，在產學合作中習得實務經驗並獲致產業界肯定。因此本課程旨在以實際演練達成兼具創新性與商品化專業設計能力養成。
description.en: Advanced Integrated Design educates students to identify and resolve design problems - innovatively and with sensitivity to the social, physical and ecological environment. Students learn to analyze and solve diverse design problems from technical, aesthetic, social and ecological viewpoints. Students are given the resources to identify, expand and test personal and professional development through an intensive exploration of design ideas. Innovation is stressed, along with the ability to refine formal design issues. There are numerous opportunities for students to work with industry through corporate-sponsored studio projects and design competitions.

name.zh: 進階整合設計研究與實務專題 (一)
name.en: Advanced integrated design research and practice project

description.zh: 產品設計專案包含研究與設計。設計專案透過工業設計的理論、方法及程序，以研究的手段形成設計決策，或以實證的方式將研究成果應用於設計實務。設計專案之設計成果必須建立在相關的研究基礎上。
description.en: This course is directed toward an approved product design project withresearch and design completed under supervision of the director. Theory andpractice in research and development dealing with the design project isreviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution tothe field of design base on supportive research.

notes: 日職碩與設計博合開；人數上限 8；設計 603

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹研究電腦整合設計與製造之軟體，並藉實例演練，以達熟悉研究電腦整合設計與製造之操作與功能。
description.en: To introduce and study the software of computer integrated design and manufacturing.  By the project practice, to be adept at the operation and function of computer integrated design and manufacturing.

name.zh: 電腦整合設計與製造研究
name.en: Study of Computer Integrated Design and Manufacturing

description.zh: 本課程旨在以個別與小組合作模式，訓練學生通曉設計開發流程，以執行設計專案。藉由實務案例的運作，及兼顧產業與組織之需求，以體現產業與社會文化面的問題與解決對策。本課程又以培育學生具備專業設計師之設計企劃提案與概念發想能力，以及學生使用設計工具之能力。
description.en: The goal of Advanced Product Design (II) is to train, under supervision, students in strategic areas of the product development process. In these projects, the students work alone or in groups. The projects are usually based on problems defined within different branches of industry and social sectors. Project work is usually done under realistic conditions, in collaboration with different industrial companies or public institutions. Students can contribute to this reality by developing sensible and usable products and systems which include qualities that speak to the heart and mind of people. We educate students as designers to have an open mind on both conceptual ideas and detailed realistic design solutions in order to develop higher quality products. Another important focus area of this course is to improve the students' capabilities in the use of modern design tools.

description.zh: 培育離岸風電相關結構與材料專業人才為當前目標。本課程之主旨為建立離岸風電之結構與材料基礎知識及分析能力。
description.en: This course aims to introduce the foundations of offshore wind structure and material. The object is to provide a fundamental understanding upon offshore wind so that the students can quickly apply what they have learned to analyze structure and material problems. The course is particularly suitable for students who are interested in the subject of offshore wind mechanical knowledge.

name.zh: 離岸風電結構與材料基礎及分析
name.en: Foundation and Analysis of structure and material on Offshore Wind Power

notes: */ 限 21 人 / 全英語 / 材料實驗 (B02)

description.zh: 本課程聚焦於未來智慧互動城市發展的理論、方法、技術應用與案例分析。在智慧城市中，民眾透過主動、被動、自主和社群平台進行交流和合作，以實現不同的生活目標。學生將獲得有關智慧互動城市領域主要研究主題和實驗實踐的知識，培養她 / 他在建設智慧互動城市方面的技能。課程內容主要將從互動和設計的角度介紹和討論不同的範例，例如普適計算、環境智能、增強和虛擬現實、環境智能、可適化人機介面、操作性介面、物聯網、智慧家居、社會規範、及空間感知… 等的應用情境與案例分析。與課程中，也將帶入不同的社會挑戰，並於學生分組專題，透過跨領域共作的模式，提出未來互動設計應用與智慧城市的方案。本課程將分為理論部分和實踐部分。理論部分涵蓋了開發和評估智慧互動系統的理論架構和方法，以及其實踐與應用方法。理論部分的部分內容將透過分組專題，同時學習理論的內容及其應用實踐的實務。
description.en: The main theme of the course is theories, methods, technologies and case studies for the development of future smart interactive cities where humans and proactive, reactive, autonomous and social platform communicate and cooperate to reach goals. The student will acquire knowledge about main research themes and experimental practices in the field of smart interactive cities as well as develop her/his skills in constructing and smart interactive cities. Different paradigms will be introduced and discussed, primarily from an interaction and design perspective such as ubiquitous computing, ambient intelligence, augmented and virtual reality, intelligent and adaptive user interfaces, tangible interfaces, persuasive technology, decision-support systems, Internet of Things, smart homes, social norms, and spatial awareness. Different societal challenges will also be addressed through cross-disciplinary collaboration in student projects. The course is divided into a theoretical part and a prac

notes: * 外碩，日碩，職碩，設計博合開，限 30 人

description.zh: 本課程之目的係在教導學生有關家具包裝，包裝材料之特性與運用、 包裝之結構與試驗方法及包裝之標準化、運輸、管理等基本知識以及 設計要領。
description.en: The aim of this course is to familiarize the students with the basic technology of furniture packaging,packaging engineering and packaging management and to train them in the techniques of protectional package design and managment so that they may continue their advanced study or apply what they learn to practice.

notes: 新聘老師江原名，設計館 207 教室

description.zh: 學習智慧型手機的程式設計，包括：應用程式基礎、準備開發環境、認識開發環境、使用者介面、各種使用者元件、資料存取、檔案存取、通訊與網路、硬體資料的存取。
description.en: Learn to program mobile phone, including: basics of application, preparing development environment, working on development environment, user interface, components, access of data and file, communication and network, access of hardware.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹現今用各種結構系統〔耐震、免震（隔震）、制震（減震）〕的特性及耐震性能原理，由基礎力學理論配合應用實務設計做一統括整理解說。並從地震中建築物實際破壞狀況的解說到耐震診斷及耐震補強技術做一現況的解說與說明。
description.en: The earthquake-proof performance principle and the characteristic of the structural system (1.General structure 2.Base isolation structure 3.Virbration control,Damper) being used well now are introduced at this course, and lectures from the mechanics theory of the base to a aactual design. In addition, the destruction situation and the earthquake-proof diagnosis reinforcement in the building are explained due to the earquake.

name.en: The earthquake-proof performance principle and the character

description.zh: 本課程以建築專業回應社會需求為依歸。針對台灣原住民部落之返鄉青年之居住與生產模式提出各項議題討論。藉由社區總體營造與民眾參與等方式，以一學期的進程發展新的部落建築形式與配置計畫，並在永續發展與保育並重的前提下，提出實質開發與營造施工的前期規劃。
description.en: This course introduces the theories, principles, and methods of designing and construction for local social issues in Taiwan. In this year, Focuses on the Settlements of aboriginal people, through cases studies and design practice, the courses seeks to expand the students understanding to the major components of site planning. The topics also focus on six premises:1.theories in relation to site planning;2.design sequences of site planning;3.investigations and analyses of the sites;4.planning and designing methods and their evaluations;5.environmental impact assessment and countermeasures.

notes: 建築三、建築四與職建都所合開，USR 計畫

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 本課程在使學生認識嵌入式系統，瞭解其系統架構，並學習嵌入式系統之硬體與軟體之設計技術。內容包含：(1) 嵌入式系統介紹 (2) 嵌入式系統應用 (3) 嵌入式系統硬體 (4) 嵌入式系統軟體架構 (5) 中斷處理 (6) 記憶體管理 (7) 週邊應用 (8) 即時作業系統。
description.en: This course let students to understand the embedded system and learn the skill to design the hardware and software of embedded system.  The contents of this course are: (1)Embedded System Introduction, (2)Embedded System Application, (3)Embedded System Hardware, (4)Embedded System Software Architectures, (5)Interrupts, (6)Memory (7) Peripherals, (8)Real-Time Operating System.

name.zh: 嵌入式系統設計與應用

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋嵌入式工業視覺系統完整的開發內容，從機器視覺系統流程與演算法設計、嵌入式系統實作、函式庫封裝、人機介面設計、工業相機取像及實際案例分析。其中包含: 1. 嵌入式系統軟體實作：Linux 環境介紹與基本程式設計 2. Qt 人機介面開發 3. 工業用機器視覺演算法 / 系統開發，並提供相關設計概念 4. 實際應用案例與設計流程介紹。學生需要先有 C/C++ 程式語言及影像處理之基礎。
description.en: The goal of this course is to learn the basic tools and techniques required to implement Machine Vision on small, embedded, portable platforms. The primary focus will be on the design of industrial vision system based on specialized embedded hardware, with a little less focus on machine vision algorithm. The course will involve: (1) Linux embedded software development; (2) Qt GUI development; (3) development of embedded industrial machine vision algorithm; (4) application practice on the embedded platform, with an industrial camera, to demonstrate real time vision processing. The only pre-requisite for the course is to know C/C++ and image processing.

description.zh: 1. 結構物劣化形態，介紹.2. 目視檢測與非破性檢測。3. 現況評估與分析。4. 維修與補強設計。
description.en: 1.Reterioration types of concrete structures. 2.Visual an Non-estructive inspection. 3.Conition Evaluation and Analysis. 4.Maintenance and Repair Design.

name.zh: 結構物檢測評估及補強

description.zh: 本課程主要探討本課程主要探討智慧生活科技相關議題。這是一門整合不同領域的新興課程，透過最新論文的閱讀與研討，學習智慧生活科技。
description.en: The goal of the course is to provide students with topics related to smart living technologies. In this course, we will take an interdisciplinary look at smart living topics and ubiquitous computing by reading and discussing recent literature.

name.en: Research Topics in Smart Living Technologies

description.zh: 本課程將探討 (1) 智財商業模式與智財交易 (2) 英美契約法 (3) 智財授權契約規範 (4) 授權程序與稽核 (5) 技術合作契約 (6) 智財合資契約及章程
description.en: This course will illustrate the following issues: (1) IP Business Model and IP Transactions, (2) Anglo-American Contract Law,  (3) Definition,  Regulation, Types & Management of IP License,  (4)License Agreement Auditing for Licensing Business, (5)  Technical Cooperation Contract, (6) IP Joint Venture Contract and Articles of Association.

name.zh: 國際智權契約與技術移轉

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹專利檢索及專利地圖的觀念，課程包含以下兩部分：一、為什麼需要進行專利檢索以及如何有效率地找到相關前案，二、如何建構專利地圖及相關資訊的應用。
description.en: The concepts of patent search and patent map will be introduced in this course. The topics of the course includes: 1. Why it is important to do patent search. 2. How to find a related prior art efficiently, 3. How to construct a patent map and exploit related information.

description.zh: 本課程將以智慧財產局最新頒佈之「專利侵權判斷要點」為藍本，主要介紹專利侵權判斷流程、專利請求項之解釋、專利侵權之比對與判斷、均等論之限制事項。並輔以國內外案列閱讀與討論，也瞭解未來專利侵害之發展趨勢。。
description.en: Based on "The Essential of Patent Infringement Assessment (2015)" issued by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office, this course will focus on critical topics, such as the procedure of patent infringement judgement, claims interpretation, comparing the properly interpreted claims to the accused devices, Doctrine of Equivalents and limitations on the Doctrine of Equivalents. Furthermore, through some Taiwan and U.S. infringement cases, participants will be familiar with the trend of patent infringement.

name.zh: 專利侵害鑒定與專利爭訟專題研究
name.en: Seminar on Patent Infringement Assessment and Patent Litigation

description.zh: 染顏料 (色料) 雖已發展百餘年，唯部分現象與實驗結果仍須進一步的研究以獲得完整正確的解釋。本課程主要探討染料的吸收光譜與其分子結構式的關係，是為具有色料化學與有機化學基礎的同學所設計的。
description.en: Although studies on synthetic colourants have been performed for more than 100 years, their detailed elucidation requires further extensive research.This course reviews the absorption features of organic dyes and recent progress in their explanation in terms of molecular structure. This course is mainly intended for organic chemists and colour chemists which are interested in the spectral characteristics of dyes and their conceptual understanding.

description.zh: 自動化應用基礎，自動化規劃設計︰1. 個體冷凍設備 2. 冷凍系統運轉操作 3. 冷凍倉儲管理自動化 4. 低溫冷凍應用自動化
description.en: Fundamentals and design of automation applications include:1. Unitary refrigeration equipment.2. Refrigerating system operation.3. Refrigerated warehousing management.4. Low temperature refrigeration application.

description.zh: 實驗是進行科學與工程研究不可或缺的工具，實驗方法的設計與實驗數據的分析更是決定實驗結果品質優劣的關鍵，本課程將介紹實驗過程所必須具備的各項知識，以數據的量測與分析為開始，並介紹量測各類物理量的感測元件，如壓力、溫度、流量及聲波等，以建立學生具備實驗量測的基礎。課程主要內容包含有基本量測、量測標準、量測單位、訊號讀取、資料簡報、數據的準確性與變異性、類比訊號量測、數位訊號量測、系統響應、感測器。
description.en: Introduction of Experiment and Measurement MethodExperiment is the essential tool for the research of science and engineering. The design of experiment and the analysis of data are the keys of the high quality of experiment. The course will introduce the materials of experiment and measurement. The procedures of measurement and the analysis method of data will be detailed investigated. And then the sensors to measure the interested physical parameters of pressure, temperature, flow rate and acoustic will be introduced. The technology of measurement and analysis of experiment will be built up in the course. The contents of the course are basic measurement, standards of measurement, dimension of measurement, access data, data presentation, accuracy and uncertainty of data, analog signal measurement, digital signal measurement, system response, and sensors.

description.zh: 本課程包含下列課題 1. 空氣清淨機構理論。2. 無塵室構造、建造及確效。3. 空氣過濾理論。4. 無塵室設計專案。5.	論文研讀。
description.en: This course covers the following Topics.1.Theory of air cleaning Mechanism.2.Clean room configuration, construction and         verification.3.Air filtration theory.4.Paper discussion.

description.zh: 本課程之目的為訓練學生有關電子設備散熱設計之相關原理與技術。介紹各項電子元件之發熱量、溫度與元件穩定性之關係，熱對流、熱輻射等熱傳原理在電子設備散熱之的應用法則；解說電子設備散熱器之演進與設計原理，如：熱管之原理與演進、小型風散之特性與設計原則等。探討電子設備的熱阻抗分析、溫度計算、熱應力分析，並介紹相關電腦輔助分析軟體。
description.en: This course introduces principles and techniques of thermal management and cooling design of electronic equipments.  Subjects of this course include: thermal and physical properties of electronic components, thermo-fluid phenomena and principles of thermal management for electronic devices, and the evolution of cooling devices such as heat pipes and micro fans, discussion of analysis methodologies and computer software of thermal management problems including thermal resistances, temperature gradient, and thermal stress.

description.zh: 系統功能分析，空調系統設計概要，負荷計算理論，送風與風管系統分析，送水系統分析，冷卻水塔熱質傳分析，主機系統性能分析
description.en: System function analysis, introduction to system designs of air-conditioning, theories on cooling load calculation, air moving and duct system analysis, water system analysis, heat and mass transfer in cooling towers, performance analysis of chillers

notes: 日職合開，6/22 改五 / 第 ABC 節

description.zh: 科技日文主要是以培養閱讀日文科技期刊或論文能力為重點，俾充實大學理工系、所學生參考日文系列技術論文或工程手冊時之理解、翻譯與書寫方式。課程內容包含：    1. 論文閱讀練習    2. 翻訣技巧    3. 技術論文之書寫
description.en: This course will direct students to learn the ability of reading and writing Japanese journals, papers engineering instruction manuals or reference materials. This course include:1.  papers reading practice2.  translation skill3.  technical writing

description.zh: 物聯網應用介紹、電腦與感測器資訊擷取傳輸、通訊協定與資訊安全
description.en: Introduction to Internet of Things applications, computer and sensor information acquisition and transmission, communication protocols and information security

name.en: Introduction to Internet of Things Applications

description.zh: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to familiarize the students with various kinds of language proficiency tests such as GEPT, TOEFL, TOEIC and many others to the same end. It is our hope that the students who finish taking the course will go on with their enthusiasm on studying foreign languages; besides, through the acquisition of the certificate when the students pass the tests, they are sure to enhance their capability in the increasingly competitive job markets.

name.en: Course in English language Proficiency Tests

notes: 本課程為未通過英文畢業門檻之課程。

description.zh: 線性代數為工程類學科之基礎數學之一，著重於訓練學生矩陣運算及基本數學証明。課程大綱如下：1. 解聯立方程式 2. 矩陣運算 3. 行列式 4. 向量空間 5. 線性轉換 6. 特徵值及特徵向量 7. 選擇性題材，視時間充許教授下列之一：矩陣數值方法，Jordan form , 或線性規劃
description.en: As a basic mathematics in engineering,the course Linear Algebraemphasizes on the subjest of matrix computation(theory) and thetechnique of mathematical proving.The outline of the course includes the following:1.Systems of Linear Equations2.Matrices3.Determinants4.Vector Spaces5.Linear Transformations6.Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors7.Advanced Topics: selet one of the following if time permitted:  Numerical Techniques in Matrix operations,Jordan form,or     Linear Programming.

description.zh: 1. 無線通訊簡介 2. 無線通訊之現況與未來發展 3. 峰巢式行動電話概論 4. 無線傳輸簡介 5. 行動電話之技術 6. 無線通訊系統與標準 7. 衛星行動通訊及其應用 8. 第三代行動通訊重要技術之導論
description.en: 1.Understanding Wireless 2.The Current and Future Developments of Wireless   Communications3.The Cellular Concepts 4.Introduction to Mobile Radio   Propagation 5.Cellular Technologies 6.Wireless Systems and Standards7.Satellits Communications Technology and Its Implementaion 8.The Key Technologies of the Trird Generation Mobile   Communication Systems

description.zh: 1. 電腦網路概述 2. 階層結構 3. 路由與交換 4. 流量與擁塞控制 5. 媒體存取控制 6. 區域網路協定與標準７．網路互連８．效能評估
description.en: 1.Introduction to Computer Network2.Layered Structure3.Routing and Switching 4.Flow and Congestion Control5.Medium Access Control 6.Local Area Network Protocols and Standards7.Network Interconnection8.Performance Analysis

description.zh: 瞭解程式語言所常用之各種資結構，１. 抽象資料類別及運算複雜度之概念，２. 靜態結構及其儲存法，３. 遞迴、堆疊、前序、中序、後序運算式，４. 佇列，５. 串列、鏈結串列，６. 樹、二元樹、平衡樹、堆積，７. 圖形，８. 排序，９. 搜尋、雜湊。
description.en: This course is mainly aimed at introducing the data  structures commonly used in programming languages, including: (1) the concept of ADT (abstract data type) and computational complexity, (2) static structures and their storage representations , (3) recursion, stacks, and prefix, infix, and posfix expressions, (4) queues, (5) lists and linked lists, (6) trees, binary trees, height balanced trees, and heaps,  (7) graphs, (8) soring, and (9) searching and hashing.

description.zh: 本課程之教學目標在使學生瞭解信號與系統之基本概念及分析方法，以作為通訊，控制，電子電路，濾波器設計及數位信號處理等課程修習之基礎。課程內容包含：(1) 標準訊號及訊號表示法 (2) 連續系統的數學分析 (3) 離散系統的數學分析 (4) 拉氏轉換分析 (5) Z - 轉換分析 (6) 傅立葉分析 (7) 工程應用。
description.en: This course contains the properties of signals, systems, LTI systems, and basis linear transforms. This is a basic course in the field of communication and control.

description.zh: 可穿戴式應用已成了全球科技產業的新寵兒之一。因此，漸漸地，穿戴式裝置已成為人們生活用品的一部分。本課程討論可穿戴式系統導論、無線感測網路導論、生醫資訊模組設計、可穿戴式教學平台之設計、情境感知遠距監控與定位救援手仗之設計、非視覺型之不穩步態偵測分析設計、自行車玩家生醫資訊守護神設計、遠距醫療照護系統設計、與客製化谷歌智慧型眼鏡設計。本課程主要達成跨領域的高度整合應用訓練課程。
description.en: Wearable applications have been become one new darling of the global technology industries. Hence, gradually, the wearable devices have become part of people's daily necessities. This course will discuss the topics of “Introduction of wearable system, Introduction of wireless sensor network, Design of Bio-information module, Design of wearable teaching platform, Design of Context-Aware Tele-monitor and Position-rescue Staff, Detection Analysis and Design for Unstable Gait with Non-vision Base, Bicycler-Player Bio-information Guardian, Design of Tele-Medicine care system, and Design of customized Google Smart-glass”. This course is highly integrated applications to achieve interdisciplinary training.

description.zh: 中文概述：本課程主要目標在介紹射頻積體電路設計之基本原理，使學生具有射頻積體電路設計之能力。其課程內容包含如下：1、被動 IC 元件的特性               10、低雜訊放大器之設計 2、MOS 元件介紹                   11、混波器 3、被動 RLC 網路                   12、射頻功率放大器  4、分散式系統                    13、回授系統       5、史密斯圖形及 S 參數             14、鎖相迴路      6、頻寬評估技術                  15、振盪器與合成器   7、射頻放大器之設計              16、結構 8、電壓參考及偏壓                  9、雜訊分析
description.en: This course is introduced the principle of Radio Frequency IC Design such that the students have the ability of Radio Frequency IC design. The contents of this course are1、CHARACTERISITICS OF PASSIVE IC COMPONENTS2、A REVIEW OF MOS DEVICE PHYSICS3、PASSIVE RLC NETWORKS4、DISTRIBUTED SYSTEMS5、THE SMITH CHART AND S-PARAMETERS6、BANDWIDTH ESTIMATION TECHNIQUES7、HIGH-FREQUENCY AMPLIFIER DESIG8、VOLTAGE REFERENCES AND BIASING9、NOISE ANALYSIS10、LNA DESIGN11、MIXERS12、RF POWER AMPLIFIERS13、FEEDBACK SYSTEMS14、PHASE-LOCKED LOOPS15、OSCILLATORS AND SYNTHESIZERS16、ARCHITECTURES

description.zh: 1. 程序同步 2. 同作機制 3. 虛擬記憶體 4. 分散式系統 5. 分散式同作控制 6. 電腦安全 7. 排程模式
description.en: 1.Process synchronization2.Concurrency Mechanisms3.Virtual memory4.Distributed Systems5.Distributed Concurrency Control6.Queuing Models

description.zh: 本課程主要係介紹資料壓縮的原理以及當前幾項重要的壓縮標準。本課程內容將涵蓋以下主題 01. 霍夫曼編碼 02. 算數編碼 03. 純量量化與向量量化 04. 線性預測與預測編碼法（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. 轉換編碼（KLT，DFT，DCT，DST 以及 Walsh-Hadamard 轉換）06. 分頻編碼法（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. 小波編碼法（SPIHT，JPEG2000）08. 字典模式編碼法 09. 跑長編碼法 10. 主題探討
description.en: This course is mainly focused on the principles of data compression techniques as well as the state-of-the-art compression standards. The course content includes01. Huffman codes02. Arithmetic codes03. Scalar quantization and Vector quantization04. Linear prediction and Predictive coding（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. Transform coding（KLT, DFT, DCT, DST, and WHT）06. Subband coding（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. Wavelet-Based Compression（SPIHT, JPEG2000）08. Dictionary techniques09. Runlength coding10. Selected topics

description.zh: 1. 微波傳輸線 2. 微波元件 3. 微波材料 4. 微波量測 5. 微波傳輸轉換 6. 微波耦合 7. 微波濾波器 8. 微波天線
description.en: 1.Microware Transmission Lines2.Microware Elements3.Microware Matericals4.Microware Measurements5.Microware Transitions6.Microware Couplers7.Microware Filters8.Microware Antennas

description.zh: 1. 無線通訊系統簡介 2. 蜂巢式行動通訊系統概念介紹 3. 無線電通訊的傳播原理 4. 行動通訊之調變技術 5. 行動通訊之多工技術 6. 天線﹑多元性與系統分析 7. 行動通訊之數位與語音編碼 8. 無線網路系統 9. 行動通訊之現有規格與未來發展
description.en: 1.Introduction to wireless communication systems2.An Overview of cellular systems3.Mobile Radis Propagation(path loss,multipath     fasing,propagation models)4.Modulation techniques for mobile communications5.Multiple access techniques for mobile communications6.Antenna,dirersity and link analysis7.Channel coding and speech coding8.Wireless networking9.Wireless systems standards and further developments

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹英語全球化、全球英語，以及英語作為國際語言的發展與相關論述，並針對英語在全球擴散的現象，檢視相關的概念與理論。本課程將探討因英語全球化所造成，在社會語言學、文化、政治經濟與教育等方面的重要議題，以及與全球英語相關的議題與爭論。
description.en: This course aims to provide students with an overview of the spread of the English language around the world, the emergence of English varieties, and the development of the popularization of English as a lingua franca. It examines the various concepts and theories developed in academia to account for the unprecedented global expansion of English. Through readings and class discussion, this course will look at key sociolinguistic, cultural, politico-economic and educational issues arising from the spread of English as well as the current issues and debates surrounding Global Englishes. Students will be encouraged to conduct original research on or detailed analysis of the implications of English as the international language.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.
